text: Kurt Stettler (21 August 1932 – 8 December 2020) was a Swiss football goalkeeper. He played for Switzerland in the 1962 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Chile 1962 Stettler began playing for the national team in 1961 and retired in 1963. Stettler was born in Stettlen, Switzerland. He mainly played with FC Basel from 1957 to 1964 making 160 appearances. Stettler died on 8 December 2020 in Zürich from COVID-19 at the age of 88.Der frühere FCB- Torhüter Kurt Stettler ist gestorben ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss association football goalkeepers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Switzerland Category:People from Bern-Mittelland District Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Bern
title: Kurt Stettler
